timeline.bodyText:
Suggested change
        
          
    

        
      
    
    
      
          
            
                    <p:pieChart rendered="#{ProcessForm.isPieModel}" model="#{ProcessForm.pieModel}" style="width: 100%"/>
          
          
            
                    <p:barChart rendered="#{ProcessForm.isBarModel}" model="#{ProcessForm.stackedBarModel}" style="width: 100%"/>
          
          
            
                    <p:pieChart rendered="#{ProcessForm.pieModel}" model="#{ProcessForm.pieModel}" style="width: 100%"/>
          
          
            
                    <p:barChart rendered="#{ProcessForm.barModel}" model="#{ProcessForm.stackedBarModel}" style="width: 100%"/>
          
      
    
    
  

You must either leave out the is or write the methods' parentheses to call a boolean getter.
timeline.author: oliver-stoehr
